## restType() function

A parameter decorator to be used in combination with the [validating()](./paratype.validating.md) class decorator to automatically validate that the each rest parameter matches the specified run-time type.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function restType(type: Type<unknown>): ParameterTypeDecorator;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | [Type](./paratype.type.md)<!-- -->&lt;unknown&gt; | The run-time type that parameter values shall be validated against |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ParameterTypeDecorator](./paratype.parametertypedecorator.md)
